RelatedSentence: PLYMOUTH ( WWJ ) - If you 're a military veteran looking for a job - you 're in luck .
Veterans will be able to apply for 240 open positions in Michigan , with an emphasis on filling roles for direct sales representatives , sales consultants and customer service opportunities .
